info.title: MediSync API
info.description: API for managing everything related to the funcionality of the MediSync App

get.description: Retrieve a list of all nurses in the system.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific nurse.

put.description: Update the details of a specific nurse by ID.

delete.description: Remove a nurse record from the system.

get.summary: Get patients assigned to a nurse.
get.description: Retrieve a list of patients with vitals assigned to a specific nurse.

get.summary: Get rooms assigned to a nurse.
get.description: Retrieve a list of rooms managed by a specific nurse.

get.summary: Get schedule entries for a nurse.
get.description: Retrieve a list of schedule entries for a specific nurse.

post.summary: Add schedule entry to a nurse.
post.description: Create a new schedule entry for a specific nurse.

put.summary: Update schedule entry for a nurse.
put.description: Update the details of a specific schedule entry for a nurse.

404.description: Nurse or schedule entry not found.

delete.summary: Remove schedule entry from a nurse.
delete.description: Delete a specific schedule entry for a nurse.

404.description: Nurse or schedule entry not found.

post.description: Adds a new patient to the system.

get.description: Returns a list of all registered patients.

delete.description: Removes all patient records from the system.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information of a specific patient.

put.description: Updates the details of a patient specified by ID.

delete.description: Removes a patient record from the system.

post.summary: Assign a patient to a bed.
post.description: Links a patient to a specific bed.

id.description: Unique ID of the wanted bed

post.summary: Assign a patient to a doctor.
post.description: Links a patient to a specific doctor.

get.description: Lists all medications associated with a specific patient.

post.description: Creates a medication record for a patient.

delete.description: Deletes a specific medication record for a patient.

put.description: Updates a specific medication record for a patient.
Updates the vitals of a patient linked to a specific bed.

get.description: Lists all users registered in the system.

post.description: Creates a user record in the system.

409.description: Conflict - User could not be created.

delete.description: Deletes the record of an existing user.

post.summary: Uploads a profile picture for a user.
post.description: Uploads and saves a profile picture for a specific user.

post.summary: Checks if a visitor is allowed.
post.description: Verifies if a visitor is allowed based on their name and phone number.

post.summary: Verifies a code for visitor validation.
post.description: Checks the validity of a code and returns the corresponding bed if valid.
Adds a new visitor associated with a specific ID.

delete.description: Removes the record of a visitor from the system.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the visitor to be deleted.

post.description: Validates the credentials provided by the user and returns a JWT token if valid.

username.description: Username of the user attempting to authenticate.

200.description: Authentication successful. Returns the JWT token and user information.

enabled.description: User's status (true: active, false: inactive (aka: removed)).

token.description: JWT token generated for subsequent authentication.

400.description: Invalid request. The provided credentials are incorrect.

post.description: Registers a doctor in the system.

get.description: Lists all doctors registered in the system.
Fetches detailed information about a specific doctor.

put.description: Updates information for a specified doctor by ID.

delete.description: Removes a doctor's record from the system.

get.description: Returns a list of patients associated with a specific doctor.

post.description: Registers a new hospital manager in the system.

post.summary: Adds new rooms to the hospital.
post.description: Registers new rooms in the system.

delete.summary: Removes all rooms from the hospital.
delete.description: Deletes all rooms registered in the system.

get.description: Lists all rooms registered in the system.
Fetches detailed information about a specific room by its ID.
Fetches detailed information about a specific room by its number.
Lists all beds registered in the system.

get.summary: Returns the occupancy of all rooms.
get.description: Lists the current patient occupancy for each hospital room.

post.summary: Sends a notification to a user.
post.description: Creates and sends a new notification to the specified user by ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user who will receive the notification.

get.description: Fetches all notifications associated with the given user ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user whose notifications will be retrieved.

200.description: List of notifications for the user.

delete.description: Removes a specific notification based on its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the notification to be removed.

profilePictureUrl.description: URL of the nurse profile picture.

enabled.description: Status of the nurse (true: active, false: inactive (aka: removed)

schedule.description: List of the Schedule Entries of a nurse

description.example: Voc recebeu uma nova mensagem no sistema.
Voc recebeu uma nova mensagem no sistema.

HeartRate.description: Heart rate of the patient in beats per minute.

BloodPressureDiastolic.description: Diastolic blood pressure of the patient in mmHg.

BloodPressureSystolic.description: Systolic blood pressure of the patient in mmHg.

Temperature.description: Body temperature of the patient in Celsius.

OxygenSaturation.description: Oxygen saturation level of the patient as a percentage.

heartbeat.description: Heart rate of the patient in beats per minute.

bloodPressure.description: Diastolic and Systolic blood pressure of the patient in mmHg.

temperature.description: Body temperature of the patient in Celsius.

o2.description: Oxygen saturation level of the patient as a percentage.

birthDate.description: Birth date of the person in ISO 8601 format.

estimatedDischargeDate.description: Estimated discharge date in ISO 8601 format.

weight.description: Weight of the person in kilograms.

height.description: Height of the person in centimeters.

conditions.description: List of medical conditions of the person.

observations.description: List of additional observations about the person.

discharged.description: Indicates whether the person has been discharged.

birthDate.description: Birth date of the person in ISO 8601 format.

estimatedDischargeDate.description: Estimated discharge date in ISO 8601 format.

weight.description: Weight of the person in kilograms.

height.description: Height of the person in centimeters.

conditions.description: List of medical conditions of the person.

observations.description: List of additional observations about the person.

discharged.description: Indicates whether the person has been discharged.

id.description: Unique ID of the hospital manager.
UNique ID of the schedule entry

profilePictureUrl.description: URL of the doctor profile picture.

enabled.description: Status of the doctor (true: active, false: inactive (aka: removed)

currentPatients.description: Current number of patients in the room.

maxPatients.description: Maximum number of patients allowed in the room.

currentStaff.description: Current number of staff members in the room.

maxStaff.description: Maximum number of staff members allowed in the room.

phoneNumber.description: Phone number associated with the code.
